publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Colwell for Nicolas Wyer dwelling in S. Martyus [sic] paryshe nere to Charynge Crosse, at the sygne of Saint Iohn Euangelist,

notesStmt.note: Signed: qd. Churchyarde, i.e. Thomas Churchyard.
Verse - "In court some say doth freindshyp flowe,".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: S. Martyus [sic] paryshe nere to Charynge Crosse, at the sygne of Saint Iohn Euangelist
